https://tmrev.io/movie/223992-Baklava 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lg251Ui4CaxZ6Eh3hiaGQTksLFR.jpg Baklava is a fairy tale about a country in the heart of the Peninsula and two brothers, separated by the timelessness of the Transition. Djore is 26, dresses in black, listens to drum & bass and does graffiti. Kotze is 9, wears a silver chain, steals, fights and loves pop folk. Their journey in search of a buried treasure introduce us in an end neighborhood populated with weird characters, dark dreams and child's fantasies. Baklava
